computing_environment:
Linux (Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.4)
Mac OS X (darwin x86_64 m64)
data_usage: The observed number of days with a maximum temperature greater than 90ºF for 1971-2000 was plotted for the northeast United States.
methodology:
1. At each grid point, the number of days with a maximum temperature greater than 90ºF was calculated for each year (provided data were available for 95% of the days at that grid point).
2. At each grid point, the mean number of days with a maximum temperature greater than 90ºF was computed for the period 1971-2000.
3. Data were plotted for all grid points in the northeast United States.
